creator: batistut@x-treme.gr
text:
I am connecting to a UTF-8 encoded database. In order to retrieve correctly the 
records and put them in a select listbox i use <%@ page contentType="text/html; 
charset=UTF-8" %>. Up to here it works fine with the greek characters.
Once i select something from the listbox and pass it in the request, the 
request.getParameter method does not return correctly the greek characters.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
This has been resolved in 3.3 to the maximum extend we can - the browser must
use Content-Type or you must have a per session encoding - i.e. if you are in 
a session and the first page is greek, the response will be decoded as greek.
The spec requires encoding in Content-Type, but no browser does it - in most 
cases the session encoding will do the trick, if not you can still set a default
per context, etc
